§lThorns II:§r
Place your book in the center (B) and use two sticks as the reagents (R). Finish the enchantment with lapis in the top left and right corners (L).

§lThorns III:§r
Place your book in the center (B) and use two sticks (R) and a cactus (r) as the reagents. Finish the enchantment with a row of lapis along the top (L).
